title: Punjab and Sind Bank Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Bank Medical Consultant Post
description: Punjab and Sind Bank has announced the official notification for 2025. to fill up the vacancies for the Bank's Medical Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BHMS, and MD/ MS can grab this chance and apply for the Punjab and Sind Bank Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form on or bef...
